articles.title: Amazon Names New AI Group Leader Amid Battle With Microsoft, Google
articles.content: Amazon stock gained fractionally after the company announced a new division and leader focused on the tech giant's AI push.

articles.title: Amazon Names New AI Chief Amid Battle to Take on Tech Rivals
articles.content: Peter DeSantis will lead the new group, Amazon Chief Executive Officer Andy Jassy said Wednesday in a message to employees, which was also posted on the company’s corporate blog. The new organization will combine Amazon’s Artificial General Intelligence team — which oversees the company’s Nova-branded AI models and the digital brains of the Alexa voice assistant — with Amazon’s chipmaking unit and quantum computing research.

articles.title: Amazon shakes up AI team as veteran Prasad leaves, DeSantis promoted
articles.content: Amazon is shaking up its artificial intelligence team with one long-time veteran heading for the exit and another ​taking over a more expansive group that includes AI models, custom silicon ‌and quantum computing. The move comes just two weeks after the Amazon Web Services annual cloud computing conference ‌in Las Vegas, which the company has turned into a showcase for AI tools and services. Amazon has been working to shake a reputation that it is trailing competitors like Google, Microsoft and OpenAI in developing AI models.

articles.title: Amazon appoints longtime AWS exec Peter DeSantis to lead new AI org
articles.content: DeSantis has spent 27 years at Amazon, including eight years as an SVP for AWS, the cloud provider that powers about one-third of the internet.

articles.title: SAN FRANCISCO SUPERVISORS DEMAND AMAZON BARGAIN WITH THE TEAMSTERS
articles.content: The San Francisco Board of Supervisors unanimously passed a resolution today demanding that Amazon immediately begin bargaining with more than 100 warehouse workers and drivers at the company's DCK6 facility. The vote followed a rally and intense advocacy by Amazon Teamsters calling out the company's ongoing refusal to recognize the union.

articles.title: Meta Puts Instagram Reels On Amazon's Fire TV. How Video Fits Into Zuckerberg's AI Push.
articles.content: Instagram Reels is making its television debut. Parent company Meta Platforms said Tuesday that it is testing an app on Amazon's Fire TV devices that would allow Instagram users to watch Reels on a bigger screen. Meta stock rose in afternoon trades.

articles.title: Amazon Freight Partners: Building trucking companies without buying tractors
articles.content: The Amazon Freight Partner program offers an innovative entry point into the world of trucking. Partners in the program can run their own companies hauling Amazon freight without purchasing tractors upfront or dealing with fuel costs. The program also opens a world of new opportunities for drivers. articles.title: iRobot co-founder says FTC's opposition to Amazon deal was 'wrong-minded' following bankruptcy filing
articles.content: iRobot filed for bankruptcy and will be bought by Chinese manufacturer after Amazon's $1.4 billion acquisition was blocked by the FTC on antitrust grounds last year.

articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO, December 16, 2025--Slope, the AI-native lending platform transforming how businesses get approved and funded, today announced a new relationship with Amazon to provide fast, transparent financing to eligible U.S.-based Amazon sellers. Morgan credit facility,2 enables eligible sellers to access flexible working capital directly through their Amazon Seller accounts — with approvals as fast as minutes. articles.title: Instagram Debuts Dedicated Television App for Amazon Fire TV
articles.content: The app will initially launch on Amazon.com Inc.’s Fire TV platform, the company said Tuesday, describing the offering as a test. If people are consuming social media platforms on television, “then we need to move to TV, too,” Mosseri said at the time.

articles.title: Google & Amazon join Trump admin's AI-powered 'Genesis mission'
articles.content: Yahoo Finance Senior Producer John Hyland tracks Thursday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Amazon (AMZN), Google (GOOG, GOOGL), Nvidia (NVDA), Palantir (PLTR), and other companies are partnering with the Trump administration on its new Genesis mission. Lululemon (LULU) is facing activist investor pressure from Elliott Investment Management, which recently took a $1 billion stake in the retailer. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

articles.title: AMAZON TEAMSTERS DEMAND NEW YORK CITY COUNCIL PASS DELIVERY PROTECTION ACT IN 2026
articles.content: Amazon Teamsters rallied outside City Hall today, during the New York City Council's final meeting of the year, to demand passage of the Delivery Protection Act in 2026 and to call out Council Speaker Adrienne Adams for siding with Amazon over eight million hardworking New Yorkers.

articles.title: AMAZON WORKERS AT DJT6 FACILITY IN RIVERSIDE JOIN TEAMSTERS
articles.content: Amazon warehouse workers at the DJT6 facility in Riverside, one of the company's largest delivery stations nationwide, have successfully organized with Teamsters Local 1932 and are demanding Amazon recognize their union. DJT6 is now the fifth Amazon facility in Southern California to join the Teamsters, along with the KSBD Air Hub in San Bernadino, DFX4 in Victorville, DAX5 in City of Industry, and DAX8 in Palmdale.
